description: A low mount for the popular RMR reflex sight.

variants.description: An adapter allowing one to install a popular Trijicon RMR red dot sight onto a common Picatinny rail.  This being a low mount, it allows the user to reduce the amount of space their gun takes, in exchange for slightly more effort while aiming.

description: A specialized mount that allows installing the RMR reflex sight on top of the ACOG sight.  Mounting both sights allows for

name.str: Trijicon RM35 RMR mount for ACOG

variants.description: A specialized mount allowing one to install a popular Trijicon RMR reflex sight on top of an equally-popular Trijicon ACOG TA01 sight.  This enables usage of different sights for different distances, potentially making aiming quicker and more precise overall.

//weight: Tarkov lists the mount's weight as 20 g
this is likely to be correct, due to the way Battlestate Games model their equipment
RM54, a similar mount, has its weight listed as very-precise 0.768 oz = 21.772 g
(other sources often mention RM54's weight as 0.8 oz = 22.68 g, which is close enough)

notes: width is 1.25× width of RM33, to account for the boss legs
height is 1.5× the height of RM33, to account for the boss legs

description: A skeletonized raised mount for the RMR reflex sight.  Makes aiming with the attached sight easier

variants.description: A lightweight mount for a popular Trijicon RMR red dot sight.  Raises the sight point significantly.  The skeletal construction of the mount allows it to save a lot of weight.
